list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a single distinct meaningful element of speech or writing, used with others (or sometimes alone) to form a sentence and typically shown with a space on either side when written or printed.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi không thích từ "không chính thức"

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: someone gave me the word to start playing
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ai đó đã cho tôi từ để bắt đầu chơi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: one's account of the truth, especially when it differs from that of another person.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: in court it would have been his word against mine
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tại tòa đó sẽ là Lời của anh ta chống lại tôi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the text or spoken part of a play, opera, or other performed piece; a script.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he had to learn his words
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đã phải học lời của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a basic unit of data in a computer, typically 16 or 32 bits long.
choose and use particular words in order to say or write (something).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he words his request in a particularly ironic way
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy nói rằng yêu cầu của anh ấy một cách đặc biệt mỉa mai
"Jay đó là một nhân vật nguy hiểm."

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: denoting a word that may be offensive or have a negative connotation, specified by the word's first letter.
